name: graphql-inversify-api-gateway
description: Graphql API Gateway example using Inversify, an inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript, and TypeORM

scripts.localhost: npm run compile && ncp node_modules dist/node_modules && npm run --silent extract-local-env-config | xargs -t sls offline --location dist --stage DEV || 0
scripts.db: cd db && docker-compose rm -f && docker-compose up
scripts.offline: stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ "npm run db" .. "npm run localhost" ]
